definition: surname Yin/dynasty name at the end the Shang dynasty, after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: The three of us stood in the bathroom eagerly waiting for the telltale line to appear.
sentences.chinese: 我們三個一起站在洗澡間殷切等待儀器指示線的出現。

sentences.english: The world is looking forward to seeing a dynamic and energetic UN.
sentences.chinese: 世界殷切期待一個充滿生機與活力的聯合國。

sentences.english: We are anxious that the same mistake is not repeated in the current round of negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 我們殷切希望在新一輪談判中不要重犯同樣的錯誤。

sentences.english: Ardent expectations were held by his parents for his college career.
sentences.chinese: 他父母對他的大學學習抱着殷切的期望。

sentences.english: But the Emperor Tiberius and many officials in the empire were ardent devotees of augury .
sentences.chinese: 但皇帝提庇留和許多官員在帝國的殷切信徒的徵兆。

sentences.english: Judges are deeply conscious of the community's high expectations of the Judiciary.
sentences.chinese: 法官深明社會大衆對司法機構抱有殷切的期望。

sentences.english: And reunion is the ardent wish of Cross-Straits blood brothers.
sentences.chinese: 盼團圓，是海峽兩岸骨肉兄弟的殷切祈盼。

sentences.english: Jan Hopkins catches up with some avid aficionados to find out more.
sentences.chinese: 簡霍普金斯採訪了一些殷切的紅酒迷了解他們的看法。

sentences.english: I can understand their eagerness that you should be the main speaker.
sentences.chinese: 我理解他們希望你作主要發言人的殷切心情。

sentences.english: The Party and people have ardent expectations of you.
sentences.chinese: 黨和人民對你們寄託着殷切的期望。

sentences.english: Can not tell of love, than to love confession to be more earnest.
sentences.chinese: 無法訴說的愛情，卻比能告白的愛情，來得更殷切。

sentences.english: Manifested Chinese Xu to distribute in the everywhere many descendants' earnest expectation.
sentences.chinese: 體現了中華徐氏分佈在海內外數千萬子孫的殷切期望。

sentences.english: The boss might give you a brawlotion, but don't hold your breath.
sentences.chinese: 老闆可能要提攜你，但別太殷切期望。

sentences.english: Wish and reunion, The Cross-Straits blood brothers ardent to pray for and wish.
sentences.chinese: 盼團圓，是海峽兩岸骨肉兄弟的殷切祈盼。

definition: to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to be deeply concerned/to be troubled (by)
to entrust a task to sb else
to have one's heart filled with/(to collide) full on/(of farm animals) heavy with young
to raise one's head and look
to seek for/to hope to gain/desirous
